        public ChatMessage setContent​(@NotNull

      • applyURLs

        public ChatMessage applyURLs​(@NotNull
                             @org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull boolean apply)
        Optional method to format URLs within the message. Converts all urls to a highlighted JSON clickable component. Returns the edited ChatMessage object.
        Parameters:
        apply - Whether URLs should be formatted.
        Returns:
        ChatMessage

      • appendMessage

        public ChatMessage appendMessage​(@NotNull

        Append another ChatMessage object to this object. Returns the edited ChatMessage object.
        Parameters:
        chatMessage - The ChatMessage that should be added.
        Returns:
        ChatMessage

      • setHoverMessage

        public ChatMessage setHoverMessage​(@NotNull
                                   @NotNull java.lang.String... text)
        Optional method to add a Tooltip to this ChatMessage object. Returns the edited ChatMessage object.
        Parameters:
        text - The String array that should be used for the tooltip content, each String represents a new line.
        Returns:
        ChatMessage

      • setLink

        public ChatMessage setLink​(@NotNull
                           @NotNull java.lang.String url)
        Optional method to add a URL to this ChatMessage object. THIS DOES NOT format any URLs, use ChatMessage#applyURLs(boolean) if you wish to format URLs within the message itself. Returns the edited ChatMessage object.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL this message should suggest when clicked.
        Returns:
        ChatMessage

      • setCommand

        public ChatMessage setCommand​(@NotNull
                              @NotNull java.lang.String command)
        Optional method to add a command to this message when clicked. Returns the edited ChatMessage object.
        Parameters:
        command - The command that should run when message is clicked.
        Returns:
        ChatMessage

      • getComponent

        public net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.TextComponent getComponent()
        The local TextComponent this ChatMessage instance wraps. -- GETTER -- Returns the final, formatted TextComponent of this ChatMessage wrapper. TextComponents should be sent via Player#spigot().sendMessage(Component)
        Returns:
        TextComponent

        public java.lang.String getRawContent()
        The raw content this ChatMessage instance wraps. -- GETTER -- Returns a String version of this ChatMessage object
